alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:08PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 400 PM MST... At 308 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maricopa, or 10 miles southwest of Sun Lakes, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Bapchule, Olberg, Sacaton, Santan and Ak-Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 167 and 181. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 147 and 162. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 43 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
